name: stephaneag - Projects index
tagline: Listing of my Github projects & links to their repo @ gh-pages
body:
### Welcome to my GitHub Projects Index Page.

Hi !

You'll find below a listing of all my open source projects hosted on Github as well as links to their dedicated repos & Github pages

Hope this helps ;)

### Projects & Repos

##### AAF - minimalistic ascii animation framework - Bash 
[AAF](https://github.com/stephaneAG/AAF-ascii_animation_framework)

##### Epocutils - helper library dedicated to the Emotiv Epoc headset - C/C++
[Epocutils](https://github.com/stephaneAG/epocutils)

##### ThatWillDoTheTrick - SiriProxy mod - Ruby, osascript, AppleScript, ..
[SiriProxymod](https://github.com/stephaneAG/siriproxy-mod)

##### LittleBrotherApp - fetch infos from facebook/twitter/google - Ruby
[LittleBrotherApp](https://github.com/stephaneAG/LittleBrotherApp)

### Authors and Contributors
StephaneAG ( @StephaneAG )

### Support or Contact
Feel free to contact me for any help, suggestion, participation to a project, or "somehow related" stuff.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
